name: Star Sea
description:
The gates are closed. The mail is checked. There's no official way to get necessary supplies to your homeworld, and nearly every unofficial way is blocked - there's only one way: you. Fly your ship through every obstacle in the way. Good luck, pilot!

Use WASD to steer your ship, left mouse button or space to fire, and P to pause when in-game.

Made for Trans Rep Jam 22. Qualifies for the achievements to have finished the game within the time limit and to feature a character using neopronouns.
